Character.Description: The desperate leader of a village plagued by bandits
A scout who watches the roads for easy prey
A scarred enforcer who maintains order among the sanzoku through fear and blade
A ruthless gang leader who rules through fear and strength
A trembling merchant held hostage for ransom from his wealthy clan
An ancient fire spirit dwelling within the sacred volcano
A warrior spirit of living flame that guards the inner sanctum
A village elder who fears the wandering monk's growing influence over the people
A charismatic figure who claims divine enlightenment
A zealous follower who has surrendered their worldly goods to the holy man
A former believer whose faith shattered when they witnessed the truth
A warrior monk sworn to protect the holy wanderer with their life
A Shinto priest investigating rumors of false miracles and stolen offerings
An eccentric collector of curiosities who found a strange scroll among old estate goods
A learned scholar who has spent decades studying the region's buried secrets
An ancient recluse who has witnessed the comings and goings of the mountain for generations
A calculating ronin who has pieced together clues to the same hidden fortune
An ancient construct protecting the treasure
A wanderer who collects and shares legends
The last living practitioner of an ancient sword art
A bitter wanderer who was cast out for lacking the spiritual purity required
A skilled warrior determined to learn the legendary technique at any cost
An aged guide who remembers when the master still accepted students
An elderly woman whose precious family heirloom was stolen
A neighbor who noticed something suspicious that night
A masterless warrior driven to theft by hard times
A dealer who trades in goods of questionable origin
A wise elder leading their people to safety
A determined youth who wants to protect their people
A skilled healer carrying precious medicines salvaged from the volcanic destruction
A silent warrior who joined the refugees with no explanation of their past
A frightened child separated from his family during the panicked evacuation
A foot soldier tracking the refugees for the warlord who claims their lands
A ruthless commander ordered to capture or eliminate the fleeing villagers
A guard at the domain border who must decide whether to grant passage
The calculating leader of your merchant association
A burly figure who protects the merchant guild's interests with intimidation
The cunning leader of a competing merchant association seeking dominance
The rival guild master's trusted second who handles their dirty work
A shadow who trades secrets to the highest bidder, loyal to coin alone
A stern official who mediates trade disputes according to the daimyō's law
A former wrestler who breaks bones for the competing merchant guild
A shrewd trader who travels the dangerous roads between towns
A checkpoint official who demands transit taxes on all goods passing through
A desperate thief who ambushes travelers on the mountain paths
A prosperous shopkeeper eager to acquire exotic goods from afar
A rich collector representing a noble house seeking rare commodities
A jovial innkeeper whose roadside lodge is a haven for weary travelers
A powerful foe known as Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō, whose mysterious demeanor intimidates all who approach Tsurumaru-jō.
A vigilant vendor named Traveling Merchant sells wares at Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 1 Ring 1.
Trail Hazard threatens travelers near Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 2 Ring 1 with aggressive aggression.
Traveling Merchant, a mysterious trader offering goods at Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 2 Ring 2.
At Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 2 Ring 3, the aggressive Trail Hazard poses a constant danger.
Trail Hazard threatens travelers near Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 2 Ring 4 with aggressive aggression.
At Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 2 Ring 5, Traveling Merchant offers merchandise with a stoic approach to business.
A aggressive predator known as Trail Hazard haunts Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 3 Ring 1.
The resolute Fellow Traveler calls Tsurumaru-jō Spoke 3 Ring 2 home.
